tool_description: API helps developers get the right color from the clothing image.
name: Color Extractor for Apparel 2
title: Color Extractor for Apparel 2

api_list.name: /colors

optional_parameters.name: remove_bg
optional_parameters.description: true if background should be removed (default=true)

optional_parameters.name: show_mask
optional_parameters.description: true if you want to include the mask of detected objects in the response (default=false)
